name: Max & Shred
overview: What happens when you put a superstar snowboarder and a scientific genius under one roof? You're about to find out! When Max Asher moves to a snowy ski-town to live with Alvin "Shred" Ackerman and his family, an unlikely friendship forms. Max loves to hit the slopes and Shred loves to hit the books. But even though these two dudes are totally different, they've always got each others' backs. There's no problem this unlikely duo can't handle.

episodes.name: The Big Hair Switch 360
episodes.overview: Alvin Ackerman feels left out when snowboarding champion Max Asher stays with his family during training season.

episodes.name: The Lien Love Triangle
episodes.overview: Max and Shred fall for the same girl, so they decide to take her on a date; Abby is on a mission to get Quinn to join the school soccer team.

episodes.name: The 1080 Room Twist
episodes.overview: Alvin and Max grow tired of being roommates; Abby and Howie help Lloyd write a novel.

episodes.name: The Nosebonk Nemesis
episodes.overview: Alvin and his family are charmed by Max's snowboarding nemesis, Yuud Nuuderuud, and refuse to believe it when Max claims Yuud is a cheater.

episodes.name: The Snow Day Variety Method
episodes.overview: A giant snow storm traps the Ackermans inside their house; Max has a panic attack and the family takes unusual steps to help him through it.

episodes.name: The Frontside Hero Slide
episodes.overview: Alvin's nemesis, Wendy Chong, sabotages his invention; Max tries to make it up to him by sneaking them into a party.

episodes.name: The Blunt Stall Auction Flail
episodes.overview: Abby accidentally auctions off Max's lucky snowboard, and he is convinced that he can no longer win.

episodes.name: The Alt-Ctrl-Shifty Laptop Burn
episodes.overview: Alvin faes a dilemna when he decides to get a sponsor; Howie makes a special snowboarding suit for Max.

episodes.name: The Half-Cab Robot Baby Bonk
episodes.overview: Alvin and Max have to care for a baby-simulator doll to pass Life Skills, but they accidentally destroy the doll.

episodes.name: The Stalefish Double Flip
episodes.overview: While ice fishing, Alvin and Max are trapped in the hut; Diane and Abby try to calm Howie after she sees a scary movie.

episodes.name: The Switch Shift Birthday Party
episodes.overview: Max opens a box and reveals a secret Alvin's kept since Abby's ninth birthday; the boys try to make up six years of birthdays for Abby.

episodes.name: Nose Butter Brain Freeze
episodes.overview: Max gets a job at the Yogurt Yeti in order to help Alvin with a contest

episodes.name: The Academic Bowl Chong Problem
episodes.overview: Alvin and Wendy form a truce to compete together in the State Academic Bowl; Abby hopes that Derek will ask her to prom.

episodes.name: The Switch Jolly Mambo Varial
episodes.overview: Alvin and Abby live in each other's lives for a bet; Lloyd tries to clean a pool that has been neglected for years.

episodes.name: The Yeti Misty Flip Makeover
episodes.overview: Alvin and Abby get help from a TV series to help save the Yogurt Yeti; Howie is put in charge of Max's fan site.

episodes.name: The Air-to-Fakie Authobiography
episodes.overview: Max employs Abby to ghostwrite his autobiography. Howie's horoscope stops her from helping Alvin.

episodes.name: The Blindside Scoutmaster Disaster
episodes.overview: Max and Shred are left in charge of the Junior Porcupines and are each determined to take the scouts on the best camping trip ever. Abby gets an unusual job at the Yogurt Yeti.

episodes.name: The Joey Huckfest Prankpipe
episodes.overview: Shred takes things too far after he discovers the joy of playing pranks; Diane tries to get a possum out of the house; Lloyd tries being the 'bad cop' parent.

episodes.name: The Buttery Bad Luck Streak
episodes.overview: Max heads to Switzerland for a big race, but his rival foils his plans by blackmailing him. Elsewhere, Howie constructs a high-tech home-security system for Lloyd.

episodes.name: The Backside Family Eggflip
episodes.overview: When Max becomes homesick, Alvin, Howie and Abby try to cheer him up by throwing him the best birthday party ever.

episodes.name: The Shifty Girlfriend 360
episodes.overview: The family is surprised when Alvin suddenly has a girlfriend, but quickly grow fond of her. Max however smells a rat and stands up for his best bud when he thinks this new love is just using Alvin for student government gain. Howie is testing the intelligence of a pig, but runs into trouble when the Ackermans keep treating it like a pet.

episodes.name: The Ghostly Grommet Bust
episodes.overview: After Alvin claims not to have any fears, Max, Howie and Juliet set out to scare him. But with Diane and Abby away at a college interview, Lloyd is left in charge and does not know how to handle a potential ghost in the house.

episodes.name: The Freeriding Family Mashup
episodes.overview: Alvin and Juliet have been dating for a while and Juliet wants their parents to meet. But what seems like a harmless idea quickly escalates into the parents forbidding Alvin and Juliet from seeing each other anymore! At the same time, Max and Abby discover Howie has been keeping an amazing snow fort secret from them.

episodes.name: The Duckfooted Dreadful Date
episodes.overview: Alvin forgets an important anniversary with Juliet, then makes things worse when he tries to follow the not-so-sage love advice of everyone in the family. But eventually, with Abby's help, Alvin finds the confidence he needs to win back Juliet back. Meanwhile, Max meets his second biggest fan, Harley, and Howie's not happy about it.

episodes.name: The Tail Grab Reality Run
episodes.overview: Max worries when his career aptitude test comes back inconclusive. Abby convinces Max that he could make a good life coach. Max then offers advice to Abby, Diane, and Lloyd, which later backfires. Meanwhile, Alvin puts Howie in charge of reprogramming Mr. P so he will stop mocking him.
